document: {"blocks":[{"key":"7judh","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bpnh9","text":"DNA was extracted from endocervical samples using the QIAamp mini kit according to the manufacturer’s instructions.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1s11d","text":"","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6771f","text":"1 Centrifuge tubes containing the endocervical specimens at 15,000 rpm for 10 minutes. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cd76d","text":"2 Remove supernatant and preserve the pellet; ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eveiv","text":"3 Add 180 μL of the ATL buffer and homogenize with the help of a vortex mixer.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"82e4t","text":"4 Add Proteinase K to the homogenized mixture and mixe by vortexing ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e0jdu","text":"5 Incubate the solution in a dry bath at 56 oC for 3 hours while homogenizing 2 to 3 times during incubation. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":44,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ffch8","text":"6 Add 200 μL AL of buffer and homogenize again using a vortex for 15 seconds","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4s60b","text":"7 Incubate the solution in a dry bath at 70°C for 10 minutes. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d6igt","text":"8 Add 200 μL of ethanol and homogenize. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"acvf8","text":"9 Then transfer the mixture carefully into a QIAamp mini spin column and centrifuge at 8,000 rpm for one minute.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"40rsv","text":"10 Discard filtrate and place the minicolumns were placed QIAamp mini spin column in new 2 mL tubes","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hop4","text":"11 Add of 500 μL buffer AW1, centrifuged at 8,000 rpm for one minute and discard the filtrate. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3uko0","text":"12 Add of 500 μL buffer AW2 was added to minicolumns.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhb6h","text":"13 Centrifuge at 14,000 rpm for 3 minutes and discard the filtrate. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8mr3i","text":"14 Centrifuge the spin column with the collection tube again at 14,000rpm for 1 minute","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a5cd9","text":"15 Place minicolumns in 1.5 mL micro-centrifuge tubes and add 50 μL of buffer AE. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"m4lr","text":"16 Incubate at room temperature for 5 minutes and centrifuge the mixture at 10,000 rpm for 3 minutes.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4jp8c","text":"17 Discard the QIAamp mini spin column and store micro-centrifuge at -20 °C for subsequent molecular analysis. ","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"299je","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
